医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
对于儿童和青少年来说，额外的体重可能意味着长期感染新冠病毒的可能性更高该研究揭示了儿童 BMI 和 PASC 风险之间的剂量反应关系，强调肥胖是新冠疫情后健康挑战的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/For-kids-and-teens-extra-weight-could-mean-a-higher-chance-of-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/For-kids-and-teens-extra-weight-could-mean-a-higher-chance-of-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f220368d-1ba3-462f-852f-51c1210c535b Wed, 30 Oct 2024 08:33:00 -0400 For kids and teens, extra weight could mean a higher chance of long COVID
研究发现尼尔马瑞韦-利托那韦可降低高危患者的严重 COVID-19 和长期 COVID 风险Nirmatrelvir-ritonavir 可有效降低未住院的轻度至中度 COVID-19 高危患者的住院率和长期 COVID 症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Study-finds-nirmatrelvir-ritonavir-reduces-severe-COVID-19-and-long-COVID-risks-in-high-risk-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Study-finds-nirmatrelvir-ritonavir-reduces-severe-COVID-19-and-long-COVID-risks-in-high-risk-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72d581b4-0399-4a40-a307-70a2ac02852e Wed, 30 Oct 2024 08:19:00 -0400 Study finds nirmatrelvir-ritonavir reduces severe COVID-19 and long COVID risks in high-risk patients
研究表明，在 COVID-19 期间，大学生的心理健康问题有所增加公共卫生博士候选人伊莱恩·拉塞尔 (Elaine Russell) 和她的导师肯尼思·格里芬 (Kenneth Griffin)（乔治梅森大学公共卫生学院全球和社区健康系教授）与托鲁洛普·阿比多贡 (Tolulope Abidogun) 一起工作，后者也是公共卫生博士生、前全球和社区现就职于里哈伊大学的健康学教授丽莎·林德利 (Lisa Lindley) 分析了美国大学健康协会国家大学健康评估 (ACHA-NCHA III) 的数据，以了解大学生的心理健康需求在 COVID-19 大流行期间发生了怎样的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Study-reveals-increased-mental-health-issues-among-university-students-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Study-reveals-increased-mental-health-issues-among-university-students-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2f26dad-df30-4a97-9e17-ec331f2cd6cb Wed, 30 Oct 2024 08:17:04 -0400 Study reveals increased mental health issues among university students during COVID-19
研究人员发现与神经性疼痛相关的遗传标记欧洲研究人员绘制了最全面的神经性疼痛表型图，并确定了与这种严重疾病相关的遗传标记。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Researchers-identify-genic-markers-linked-to-neuropathic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Researchers-identify-genic-markers-linked-to-neuropathic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b14bf887-250a-4a98-b353-042b60b72b71 Wed, 30 Oct 2024 08:06:08 -0400 Researchers identify genetic markers linked to neuropathic pain
人格特质影响体力活动和久坐行为于韦斯屈莱大学老年学研究中心和运动与健康科学学院进行的一项研究观察到人格特质与体力活动和久坐行为之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Personality-traits-influence-physical-activity-and-sedentary-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Personality-traits-influence-physical-activity-and-sedentary-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ab5db9e-734b-44d0-9955-627085a5a48a Wed, 30 Oct 2024 07:59:00 -0400 Personality traits influence physical activity and sedentary behavior
Fabric Genomics 与 Intermountain Children's Health 合作，利用 Broad Clinical Labs 的全基因组测序提高婴儿和儿童的精确诊断Fabric Genomics 是人工智能 (AI) 驱动的下一代测序解释领域的领导者，宣布与 Intermountain Children's Health 建立新的合作伙伴关系，分析由 Broad Clinical Labs 测序的儿童的整个基因组，以帮助加快诊断可能患有遗传性疾病的儿童疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Fabric-Genomics-partners-with-Intermountain-Childrene28099s-Health-to-enhance- precision-diagnosis-of-infants-and-children-using-whole-基因组测序-来自-Broad-Clinical-Labs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Fabric-Genomics-partners-with-Intermountain-Childrene28099s-Health-to-enhance- precision-diagnosis-of-infants-and-children-using-whole-基因组测序来自 Broad-Clinical-Labs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8965649c-e8b7-4aa1-a3d7-fe67d9959b86 Wed, 30 Oct 2024 07:57:00 -0400 Fabric Genomics partners with Intermountain Children’s Health to enhance precision diagnosis of infants and children using whole genome sequencing from Broad Clinical Labs
纳米塑料会损害抗生素的有效性并促进耐药性在最近的一项研究中，维也纳医科大学大力参与的一个国际研究小组研究了沉积在体内的纳米塑料颗粒如何影响抗生素的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Nano Plastics-impair-antibiotic-effectness-and-promote-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Nano Plastics-impair-antibiotic-effectness-and-promote-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8214ab09-16f5-420a-95ca-77ef989903c5 Wed, 30 Oct 2024 07:52:00 -0400 Nanoplastics impair antibiotic effectiveness and promote resistance
DescendantsDNA, Inc. 与 Broad Clinical Labs 和 Fabric Genomics 合作提供基因组服务，以支持人类长寿DescendantsDNA, Inc. 很高兴地宣布与 Broad Clinical Labs (BCL) 达成一项新协议，通过尖端基因组学来延长人类寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/descendantsDNA-Inc-engages-Broad-Clinical-Labs-and-Fabric-Genomics-for-genomic-services-to-support- human-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/descendantsDNA-Inc-engages-Broad-Clinical-Labs-and-Fabric-Genomics-for-genomic-services-to-support- human-longevity.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24d645f2-b5f8-4c1f-b7c6-103e8742f61b Wed, 30 Oct 2024 07:50:00 -0400 descendantsDNA, Inc. engages Broad Clinical Labs and Fabric Genomics for genomic services to support human longevity
新研究证实：抗炎吸入器可减少严重哮喘并发症这项研究强调了抗炎吸入器在哮喘治疗中的益处，显示出并发症的减少和症状控制的适度改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/New-study-confirms-anti-炎症-inhalers-reduce-severe-asthma-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/New-study-confirms-anti-炎症-inhalers-reduce-severe-asthma-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0454736-17c7-45d1-8822-368c801fd600 Wed, 30 Oct 2024 07:39:00 -0400 New study confirms: Anti-inflammatory inhalers reduce severe asthma complications
调查显示 50 岁以下成年人缺乏对胰腺癌风险的认识虽然 50 岁以下人群的胰腺癌发病率不断上升，但俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心 – Arthur G. James 癌症医院和 Richard J. Solove 研究所 (OSUCCC – James) 进行的一项新调查显示，大多数人仍然认为，胰腺疾病只影响老年人，而且他们无法采取任何措施来降低风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Survey-reveals-lack-of-awareness-about-pancreatic-cancer-risk-among-adults-under-age-50.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/Survey-reveals-lack-of-awareness-about-pancreatic-cancer-risk-among-adults-under-age-50.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8281a797-79a7-41d5-9b84-15b835f5c6b3 Wed, 30 Oct 2024 07:34:13 -0400 Survey reveals lack of awareness about pancreatic cancer risk among adults under age 50
